text.headline: Marina Golf
text.text: Paradise Isle is a mixed-use development in North Fort Myers, Florida. The proposed project is being developed by Dennis Fullenkamp Realty and is expected to cost up to $1 billion to complete. The site is 271 acres and includes Paradise Marina and the closed Lochmoor Country Club golf course. Ron Garl has been selected to rebuild the abandoned golf course into a public resort play golf course for the neighboring Cape Coral community. Approval for the site re-construction has been granted by Lee County.
